brief_title: Establishment of a Database for Long-Term Monitoring of Patients With Nephropathic Cystinosis
brief_summary: OBJECTIVES: I. Establish a computerized databank to monitor the progress of patients with cystinosis treated with cysteamine. II. Track and monitor all patients including renal transplant, dialysis and post renal transplants.
detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE: Data are collected from patients and physicians. Information includes disease, treatment, family history, demographic, and physical exam data. The dates of kidney transplantation and/or dialysis initiation are also recorded.
criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA: Nephropathic cystinosis diagnosis by white-cell cystine measurement, including infantile and late-onset forms
